title: Condensed Serif
content:
I'm looking for a font very similar to this MINUS the 3d effect.

Any suggestions? TIA

Font: 

 PT Barnum, Alexandre

author: Mac_Ink

comments.content:
PTBarnum from Bitstream has the feel but no shading.  
The original attached shaded font is Alexandre or Shady Characters from Dafont (same font different names)
